column2: Heal a small amount for every soul reaped.
Fire a projectile when reaping a soul.
Marks enemies to drop their soul on death
Right click to select which soul type the wand consumes
Consume a soul to fire a powerful explosive projectile
Right click to cycle which spell is cast from the tome
Right click to cycle which stat is upgraded, cast on the tome to upgrade
Increases the speed and damage of a projectile at the cost of a soul
Consumes a portion of your souls to increase the power of a projectile
Right click to consume a soul to boost the next cast of the wand
Consume a soul to launch an arrow that flies through terrain
Expels a soul in the form of a bouncing projectile
Consume a soul to fire a powerful, slow moving projectile
While holding the wand, consumes souls to heal the wielder
Launches a halo that marks enemies to drop their souls
Consumes a soul to launch a halo that causes hit enemies to take more damage
While holding the wand, consumes souls to turn the wielder invisible
While holding the wand, consumes souls to enrage the wielder
Marks enemies to drop two souls on death
Marks enemies to drop a random soul on death
Causes enemies in a large field to drop their souls on death
Teleport forward, reaping souls in an area that grows for the longer you teleport for
Right click to load a soul into the chamber and left click to fire
Left click to slice for a soul and right click to dash
Buffs the projectile based on a consumed soul
Buffs the projectile based off how many boss souls you have
Buffs the projectile based off how many boss souls you have
While holding the wand, consumes souls to allow the wielder to edit wands
Consumes a soul to make the projectile deal a critical hit
Marks burning enemies to drop a soul on death
Reduces a spell's mana cost and recharge time greatly, at the cost of a soul
Expels a soul in its purest form
Restores mana based off how many boss souls you have
Recharges the wand faster based off how many boss souls you have
Consumes a worm soul to make a projectile dig through anything
Consumes a mage soul to make a projectile pierce and deal critical hits
Consumes a slimes soul to infuse a projectile with rejuvenating properties
Fill both this flask and yourself with perfect soul blood and kick to create a Phylactery.
Kick to power with 10 souls. Each point nullifies a hit of damage.
Strike yourself down with enough power to fully obliterate the soul.
Hunt down & kill your soul at the haunted gate.
Bring a storm to the Master's abode, and let the soul rest in the environment.
While reaching for heaven, expel the souls of lesser creatures.
Cherish the soul with many friends.
Entertain the soul with a fight at the amphitheatre down below.
Kick the soul and the process will complete.
What is this? Some kind of Souls?
Doubles your current count for each soul.
Increase the number of souls you start with.
